article_node.title: What the National Guard in DC looks like
article_node.summary: The National Guard has increased its presence in Washington, D.C., with approximately 800 troops mobilized to assist local law enforcement and ensure community safety as part of President Trump's crime-fighting measures. Their duties include patrolling, protecting monuments, and traffic control, although they will not be armed or able to make arrests. The deployment began earlier in the week and is expected to gradually expand in the coming days.
